title: Easeout Weekly #21
body:
![Eleventy Balloon Animal](/images/uploads/eleventy-tailwind-alpine.png) [An Eleventy Starter with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js](https://css-tricks.com/eleventy-starter-with-tailwind-css-alpine-js/) A wonderful starter demo with Eleventy, including integrations with Nunjucks for templating, Tailwind for styles and Alpine.js for scripts. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/eleventy-starter-with-tailwind-css-alpine-js/)
![CSS Transitions CanIUse](/images/uploads/css3-transitions.png) [CSS Transitions In Vuejs And Nuxtjs](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/css-transitions-vuejs-nuxtjs/) In this tutorial, we’ll see the different ways to apply transitions in both Vue.js and Nuxt.js applications. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/css-transitions-vuejs-nuxtjs/) [](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/css-transitions-vuejs-nuxtjs/)
![Next.js Blog Demo](/images/uploads/next-js-blog.png) [Building a Blog with Next.js](https://css-tricks.com/building-a-blog-with-next-js/) A nice tutorial using [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) to build a static blog framework with a design and structure inspired by [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/). [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/building-a-blog-with-next-js/)
![Removing Panic From E-Commerce Article Card](/images/uploads/ecommerce-shipping-inventory-alerts.png) [Removing Panic From E-Commerce Shipping And Inventory Alerts](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/ecommerce-shipping-inventory-alerts/) This article looks at some ways that web designers can keep panic and frustration from seeping into the e-commerce experience. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/ecommerce-shipping-inventory-alerts/)
![Emotion List Logo](/images/uploads/emotion-lists.png) [How to Make a List Component with Emotion](https://css-tricks.com/how-to-make-a-list-component-with-emotion/) A neat tutorial showing how to build a list component, while using [Emotion](https://emotion.sh/docs/introduction) to manage your styles. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/how-to-make-a-list-component-with-emotion/)
![Tauri And Vue.js Article Card](/images/uploads/tiny-desktop-apps-tauri-vuejs.png) [Creating Tiny Desktop Apps With Tauri And Vue.js](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/tiny-desktop-apps-tauri-vuejs/) In this article, Kelvin explains how Tauri plays well with the progressive framework Vue.js by integrating both technologies in bundling an example web app as a native application. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/tiny-desktop-apps-tauri-vuejs/)
![Novra Design Magazine](/images/uploads/novum.jpg) [15 Graphic Design Magazines You Should Definitely Subscribe To](https://line25.com/inspiration/graphic-design-magazines) Some awesome design inspiration from magazines that don’t fail to fill our creativity with vibrant colors and amazing design ideas. [Check them out ➡️](https://line25.com/inspiration/graphic-design-magazines)
![WooCommerce on CSS-Tricks](/images/uploads/woocommerce-poster.png) [WooCommerce on CSS-Tricks](https://css-tricks.com/woocommerce-on-css-tricks/) A breakdown of the Woo Commerce setup on CSS-Tricks! [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/woocommerce-on-css-tricks/)
![GraphQL, Express and Netlify Logos](/images/uploads/graphql-express-netlify.png) [Building Serverless GraphQL API in Node with Express and Netlify](https://css-tricks.com/building-serverless-graphql-api-in-node-with-express-and-netlify/) A great tutorial showing how simple it is to deploy your very own API, without the headache of managing a server. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/building-serverless-graphql-api-in-node-with-express-and-netlify/)
![Web.dev metrics](/images/uploads/web-dev-live-google-event.png) [Make Your Sites Fast, Accessible And Secure With Help From Google](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/web-dev-live-google-event-2020/) From June 30th to July 2nd, Google’s web platform team brought together the web community for [web.dev LIVE](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/web-dev-live-google-event-2020/web.dev/live?utm_source=SmashingMag&utm_medium=Fpost). This article provides a nice roundup of advances in Googles' web development ecosystem. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/web-dev-live-google-event-2020/)
![Gatsby Logo](/images/uploads/blogfeature-gatsby.jpg) [Understanding Plugin Development In Gatsby](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/understanding-plugin-development-gatsby/) In this post, we'll learn all about Gatsby plugins! And we even create a comment plugin that can be used on any Gatsby website, one of which we will install by the end of the tutorial. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/07/understanding-plugin-development-gatsby/)
![ShopTalk Logo](/images/uploads/shoptalk.png) [CSS Tricks, Old Tech, Apple Goes Arm, and Building an Image Machine](https://shoptalkshow.com/420/) We're talking about Chris' new book of CSS Tricks, building support for old tech on the web, Apple going Arm and what that might mean for Parallels, and building Dave's magical image machine. [Listen up ➡️](https://shoptalkshow.com/420/)

short: A weekly roundup of the latest web design & development news.
